title: 2015 Subaru WRX STI: Everything You Need To Know -- AFTER/DRIVE
description: Subaru's newest STI has been criticized for keeping the same 300+hp engine as the previous STI. Others were turned off by its new design. But is the 2015 STI actually a far better car, despite its specs? We find out. With Jason Harper, Bloomberg News and Automobile; and Travis Okulski, deputy editor of Jalopnik.

asset.title: 2015 Subaru WRX STI: Everything You Need To Know -- AFTER/DRIVE
